name: Ikazuchi no Senshi Raidy
overview: A young sexy female warrior Raidi has come to a village whose inhabitants were abducted by young sexy female... demons. The demons imprisoned them in a huge tower. Raidi decides to enter the tower and to free the prisoners. Ikazuchi no Senshi Raidi is a rather basic dungeon-crawler with a twist: hentai. The enemies in the game are female (demonic female, but female nevertheless); when Raidi defeats them, they lose their clothes. There are also event scenes that contain sexual images. The gameplay involves Raidi moving through pseudo-3D environments and defeating enemies in turn-based combat. The only location in the game is the tower; there are no "friendly" areas and no possibility to acquire weapons, equipment, or items but by finding them in the tower or having them randomly dropped by enemies.
